name: Morgaston Woods Green Route, The Vyne

ai.summary: A gentle 4.2 km circuit along Morgaston Woods Green Route at The Vyne, offering an easy, family-friendly forest walk through shaded paths and open glades. The route is well signed and suitable for most ages and mobility levels.
ai.terrain_summary: The hike primarily follows compact forest trails and grassy paths with occasional gravel sections. Expect some mud after rain and a few uneven spots, but footing is generally easy. The route alternates shaded woodland with sunnier clearings, and seating or gentle viewpoints are available along the way.
ai.safety_notes: Wear sturdy, waterproof footwear and check the forecast before you go. Stay on marked paths, be mindful of other walkers and dogs, and supervise children. Be aware of ticks in woodland and perform a quick check after your walk. Bring a map or GPS, ample water, and a light layer for sudden weather changes; carry a small first aid kit. In an emergency, contact local services.
ai.best_seasons: Year-round, with spring and autumn offering the best light and comfortable temperatures. Summer can be pleasant but busier; winter may be muddy and daylight hours are shorter.
